\"{A1E0D84C-A43B-41C6-83E5-5DB092BAA2E2}\";\n        </script>\n    <section class=\"mini-rif-form\" data-component=\"mini-rif\">\n        <div class=\"wrapper\">\n            <h2 class=\"mini-rif-form__title heading-center\">Request a Brochure</h2>\n            <div class=\"column-wrapper\">\n                <div class=\"column--3\">\n                    <div class=\"mini-rif-form__location\">\n                        <input type=\"hidden\" id=\"hidOnlineID\" value=\"{A1E0D84C-A43B-41C6-83E5-5DB092BAA2E2}\">\n\n                        <label for=\"LocationOfInterest\">Location Of Interest <abbr class=\"req\" title=\"required\">*</abbr></label>\n\n                                <h5 class=\"mini-rif-form__location-title\">The Art Institute of Pittsburgh — Online Division</h5>\n<select aria-invalid=\"false\" aria-required=\"true\" class=\"required mini-rif-form__select hide\" data-val=\"true\" data-val-required=\"Required\" class=\"jump-links__item jump-links__item--blue\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"wrapper\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"jump-links__item-title\" id=\"tab3\" aria-hidden=\"true\" role=\"tab\" arialabelledby=\"tab3\" role=\"tabpanel\" aria-hidden=\"true\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<li class=\"jump-links__item--child jump-links__item--child--overview\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<a href=\"/online/academics/animation-effects\" class=\"jump-links__link--child\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tOverview\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</a>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</li>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<li class=\"jump-links__item--child\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<a href=\"/online/academics/animation-effects/media-arts-animation-degree-programs\" class=\"jump-links__link--child\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMedia Arts &amp; Animation\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</a>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</li>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t</ul>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t\t\t\t</li>\n\t\t\t\t\t<li class=\"jump-links__item Ai\">\t\t\t\t\t\t<h3 class=\"heading \">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"heading__span\">About Ai Pittsburgh-Online Division</span>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t</h3>\n</a>\n\t\t\t</div>\n\n\t\t\t<div class=\"tout alt=\"Schedule a Visit\">\t\t\t\t\t\t<h3 class=\"heading \">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"heading__span\">Academic Achievement Grant</span>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t</h3>\n</a>\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</section>\n    <section>\n        <div class=\"wrapper\">\n            <h2 class=\"heading-center\">Upcoming Events</h2>\n\n                <div class=\"column--3\">\n                    <h4>Graduation Recognition Ceremony</h4>\n                    <p>\n                            <strong>April 26, 2017</strong>\n                            <br>\n                            <strong>8:00 PM  to 9:30 PM</strong>\n                    </p>\n                    <p>\n                        </p><p>Please join us for our first quarterly graduate recognition ceremony!</p>\n                    <p></p>\n\n                    <a class=\"btn-tertiary info-tog\" data-ga-event=\"upcomingMore\">Read More</a>\n                    <div class=\"info-content\" style=\"display: none;\">\n                        <div class=\"info-content__container\">\n                            <i class=\"icon-cancel modal-close\"></i>\n                            <h4>Graduation Recognition Ceremony</h4>\n                            <img src=\"\" alt=\"\">\n                            <p>\n                                <strong>April 26, 2017</strong>\n                                <br>\n <strong>8:00 PM to 9:30 PM</strong>                             </p>\n                            <p>Please join us for our first quarterly graduate recognition ceremony! We will be honoring our Winter Quarter 2017 graduates, honor graduates, and best in show portfolio winners. This event is open to all students and faculty. We encourage all to attend and celebrate the achievements of our graduates!</p>\n                        </div>\n                        <!-- modal toggle bg -->\n                        <div class=\"info-content__bg\"></div>\n                    </div>\n\n                </div>\n            <div class=\"tout column--1\">\n                <a class=\"btn-tertiary\" href=\"/online/campus-events\">View All Events</a>\n            </div>\n        </div>\n    </section>\n    <section class=\"content--mid background--greenBlue\">\n        <div class=\"wrapper\">\n            <h2>Academic Achievement Grant: Earn up to $38,500!</h2>\n            <p>Exclusively for online students, this grant’s goal is to make pursuing your creative career at The Art Institute of Pittsburgh – Online Division as affordable as it is accessible.</p>\n            <p>\n<a href=\"/online/tuition-aid/academic-achievement-grant\" class=\"btn-primary\" target=\"Custom\">                        <span>See if you qualify!</span>\n</a>                                            </p>\n        </div>\n    </section>\n\n<section>\n\t<div class=\"wrapper\">\n\t\t<h2 class=\"heading-center\">Latest Happenings</h2>\n\t\t\t<div class=\"column--3\">\n\t\t\t\t<a href=\"/online/about/blog/brightspace\" data-ga-event=\"happeningsMore\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<img alt=\"Brightspace\" src=\"/~/media/ai/main/images/national/blog/ai-brightspace.ashx\">\n\t\t\t\t</a>\n\t\t\t\t<h5>\n\t\t\t\t\t<a href=\"/online/about/blog/brightspace\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\tAnnouncing Brightspace for all students!\n\t\t\t\t\t</a>\n\t\t\t\t</h5>\n\t\t\t\t<p>\n\t\t\t\t\tThe Art Institutes system of schools is replacing eCollege/eCompanion with a new virtual learning platform.\n\t\t\t\t</p>\n\t\t\t\t<p>\n\t\t\t\t\t<a class=\"btn-tertiary\" data-ga-event=\"happeningsMore\" href=\"/online/about/blog/brightspace\">Read More</a>\n\t\t\t\t</p>\n\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t\t<div class=\"column--3\">\n\t\t\t\t<a href=\"/online/about/blog/sxsw-gaming-features-student-created-from-the-art-institutes\" data-ga-event=\"happeningsMore\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<img alt=\"SXSW Gaming\" src=\"/~/media/ai/main/images/austin/blog/aiaus-sxsw-thumb-rev.ashx\">\n\t\t\t\t</a>\n\t\t\t\t<h5>\n\t\t\t\t\t<a href=\"/online/about/blog/sxsw-gaming-features-student-created-from-the-art-institutes\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\tSXSW Gaming Features Student Created Games From The Art Institutes\n\t\t\t\t\t</a>\n\t\t\t\t</h5>\n\t\t\t\t<p>\n\t\t\t\t\tGaming students from The Art Institute of Austin showcase their creations at SXSW Gaming.\n\t\t\t\t</p>\n\t\t\t\t<p>\n\t\t\t\t\t<a class=\"btn-tertiary\" data-ga-event=\"happeningsMore\" href=\"/online/about/blog/sxsw-gaming-features-student-created-from-the-art-institutes\">Read More</a>\n\t\t\t\t</p>\n\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t\t<div class=\"column--3\">\n\t\t\t\t<a href=\"/online/about/blog/dream-center-foundation\" data-ga-event=\"happeningsMore\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<img alt=\"Dream Center Foundation\" src=\"/~/media/ai/main/images/national/blog/ai_dream_center_314x114.ashx\">\n\t\t\t\t</a>\n\t\t\t\t<h5>\n\t\t\t\t\t<a href=\"/online/about/blog/dream-center-foundation\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\tEducation Management Corporation announces execution of a definitive agreement for the sale to the Dream Center Foundation.\n\t\t\t\t\t</a>\n\t\t\t\t</h5>\n\t\t\t\t<p>\n\t\t\t\t\tDream Center Foundation is a not-for-profit foundation.\n\t\t\t\t</p>\n\t\t\t\t<p>\n\t\t\t\t\t<a class=\"btn-tertiary\" data-ga-event=\"happeningsMore\" href=\"/online/about/blog/dream-center-foundation\">Read More</a>\n\t\t\t\t</p>\n\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t\n\t\t<div class=\"tout column--1\">\n\n\t\t\t<a href=\"/online/about/blog\" class=\"btn-tertiary\">View All Entries</a>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n</section>\n\n\n<!-- Slider -->\n<!--\nThere are several parts to the Slider:\nThere are three content options.\n1. A two content item layout on one slide\n2. A single content item\n3. A single image.\n\nInside a content item will be two columns. The first contains an image. The second contains content header (ex: Featured Alumni), The content title, The content label (ex: Graphic Design, 2017), a description, and a call to action.\n\n\n-->\n\n    <section class=\"js-slider-section background--black\">\n        <div class=\"wrapper\" data-component=\"slider\">\n            <div class=\"slider\">\n                <h2>Meet Our Alumni</h2>\n                <ul class=\"slick-slider slick-initialized\" data-slider-type=\"alumnicarousel\">\n                        <div aria-live=\"polite\" class=\"slick-list draggable\"><div class=\"slick-track\" style=\"opacity: 1; width: 722px; transform: translate3d(0px, 0px, 0px);\" role=\"listbox\"><li class=\"slick-slide slick-current slick-active\" data-slick-index=\"0\" aria-hidden=\"false\" style=\"width: 361px;\" tabindex=\"-1\">\n                            <div class=\"slider__slide column--1\">\n                                <img src=\"/~/media/ai/main/images/online/after-graduation/alumni-stories/alumni-profiles/nicole_simila.ashx?h=400&amp;w=450&amp;la=en&amp;hash=8D5D55703DB394FFF8F2883572A99E6F1D9C2031\" alt=\"Nicole_Simila\">\n                                <h4>Nicole Simila</h4>\n\n                                <div class=\"slider__slide__degree\">\n                                        <span class=\"color--indigo\">\n                                            Digital Photography\n , 2016                                          </span>\n                                    \n                                    \n\n                            </div>\n                            <p class=\"slider__slide__description\">\"[My education] helped me to learn ways to use my camera that I had never thought of, or couldn't seem to teach myself.\"</p>\n                                <a href=\"javascript:;\" class=\"btn-tertiary btn-tertiary--indigo\" tabindex=\"0\">Read More</a>\n                            <div class=\"slider__slide__story\">\n                                <h5>Nicole Simila</h5>\n                                <p><strong>Self-employed Business Owner and Photographer at EvelynJo Photography</strong></p>\n<p>Nicole Simila is a self-employed business owner and photographer at EvelynJo Photography. She runs her business on nights and weekends, after she completes her full time job. This determination, and her passion for photography, keeps her motivated. “There are going to be times where you feel like you may have failed but keep your head high and you will succeed.”</p>\n<p>She discusses a time when she was shooting weddings—only to realize that it wasn’t what she wanted to be doing. “The stress and worrying that came a long with it wasn't worth the time and effort. I figured out through [my education] that I wanted to mainly focus on working with children.” Today, she says that her studio work with children provides smiles and creates joy for the children’s parents, friends, and family.</p>\n<p>Nicole adds that since she’s completed her education, her photography workload has increased. She attributes this to the confidence she’s gained as a photographer.</p>\n<p>“My hard work and determination throughout school helped me to succeed and learn so much more than I had known before.” She says that she always has room to grow and seeks out tips and tricks to add to her repertoire.</p>\n<p>Nicole, who in 2016 earned an Associate of Science in Photography from The Art Institute of Pittsburgh—Online Division, says that her education helped her to learn about studio lighting and camera operations. “It helped me to learn ways to use my camera that I had never thought of, or couldn't seem to teach myself.”\n</p>\n<p><strong>See <a href=\"http://aiprograms.info\" target=\"_blank\" tabindex=\"0\">aiprograms.info</a> for program duration, tuition, fees and other costs, median debt, salary data, alumni success, and other important info.</strong></p>\n                                <a href=\"/online/graduation/alumni-stories/nicole-simila\" tabindex=\"0\">Read More...</a>\n                                <i class=\"icon-cancel\"></i>\n                            </div>\n                        </div>\n                    </li><li class=\"slick-slide slick-active\" data-slick-index=\"1\" aria-hidden=\"false\" style=\"width: 361px;\" tabindex=\"-1\">\n                            <div class=\"slider__slide column--1\">\n                                <img src=\"/~/media/ai/main/images/online/after-graduation/alumni-stories/alumni-profiles/william_douglas.ashx?h=400&amp;w=450&amp;la=en&amp;hash=BC3E871DB03ADD5C9ADDEBF652889DAD8E4C4014\" alt=\"William_Douglas\">\n                                <h4>William Douglas</h4>\n\n                                <div class=\"slider__slide__degree\">\n                                        <span class=\"color--indigo\">\n                                            Digital Photography\n , 2015                                          </span>\n                                    \n                                    \n\n                            </div>\n                            <p class=\"slider__slide__description\">\"I try to encourage others to express their creativity and think outside the box.\"</p>\n                                <a href=\"javascript:;\" class=\"btn-tertiary btn-tertiary--indigo\" tabindex=\"0\">Read More</a>\n                            <div class=\"slider__slide__story\">\n                                <h5>William Douglas</h5>\n                                <p><strong>Spent 10 years in the United States Army as an 11B/4 sniper</strong></p>\n<p>William Douglas spent 10 years in United States Army as an 11B/4 sniper. “I served during Operation Desert Shield, Desert Storm, and Operation Just Cause and was honorably discharged as Staff Sargent,” he says. Today, he is the owner of Liam Photography in Atlanta, Georgia. He takes professional, editorial, portrait, and drone photos. And recently he was honored to have one of his my photos selected by National Geographic to be the on the cover of its newest book on “Big Cats.”</p>\n<p>William says that one of the biggest challenges he faced as a photographer was giving models instructions for poses. “I was able to overcome this by shooting friends and family members and working with some of the members of my photography club. I learned to be more of a leader when directing shoots. I try to encourage others to express their creativity and think outside the box.”</p>\n<p>He recommends that current students build their professional connections and experience through networking and reading photography blogs and articles. “I spend a lot of time on sites like SLR Lounge reading articles and blog posts,” he adds.</p>\n<p>William, who in 2015 earned an Associate of Science in Photography from The Art Institute of Pittsburgh—Online Division, says that his education provided a strong foundation for his career. But he adds that being a photographer requires constant learning. “You cannot just graduate and think you will immediately make money as a photographer. It takes, time, patience, and networking—a lot.”</p>\n<p><strong>See&nbsp;<span style=\"outline-color: initial; outline-width: initial;\"><a style=\"outline: none; margin-top: 0px;\" tabindex=\"0\"></a></span><a href=\"http://aiprograms.info/\" tabindex=\"0\">http://aiprograms.info</a>&nbsp;for program duration, tuition, fees and other costs, median debt, salary data, alumni success, and other important info.</strong></p>\n                                <a href=\"/online/graduation/alumni-stories/william-douglas\" tabindex=\"0\">Read More...</a>\n                                <i class=\"icon-cancel\"></i>\n                            </div>\n                        </div>\n                    </li></div></div>\n                        \n                </ul>\n            </div>\n        </div>\n    </section>\n<section>\n    <div class=\"wrapper\">\n        <h3 class=\"heading-center\"></h3>\n\n        <div class=\"column--2\">\n            \n        </div>\n\n        <div class=\"column--2\">\n            \n\n        </div>\n    </div>\n</section>\n\n        </main>\n\n        <footer role=\"contentinfo\">\n            <!-- Local Footer -->\n<!-- There are 8 Institutes, is a system of schools throughout the United States. Programs, credential levels,\ntechnology, and scheduling options vary by school and are subject to change. Not all online programs\nare available to residents of all U.S. states. Several institutions included in The Art Institutes system are campuses of Argosy University. The Art Institute of Pittsburgh—Online Division<span itemprop=\"address\" itemtype=\"http://schema.org/PostalAddress\">, 1400 Penn Avenue,&nbsp;<span itemprop=\"addressLocality\">Pittsburgh</span>, <span itemprop=\"addressRegion\" title=\"Pennsylvania\">PA</span> <span itemprop=\"postalCode\">15222</span></span> © 2017 The Art Institutes. played\";dataLayer.push({event:\"youtube\",eventCategory:\"Youtube Videos\",eventAction:b,eventLabel:c.title})}1!=a.lastP&&setTimeout(onPlayerPercent,1E3,a)}}var onPlayerPercent(a){if(a.getPlayerState()==YT.PlayerState.PLAYING){var played\";dataLayer.push({event:\"youtube\",eventCategory:\"Youtube Videos\",eventAction:b,eventLabel:c.title})}1!=a.lastP&&setTimeout(onPlayerPercent,1E3,a)}}var type=\"text/javascript\" id=\"\">var vimeoGAJS={iframes:[],gaTracker:void 0,eventMarker:{},init:function(){vimeoGAJS.iframes=$(\"iframe\");$.each(vimeoGAJS.iframes,function(b,a){var c=$(a).attr(\"id\");vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[c]={progress25:!1,progress50:!1,progress75:!1,videoPlayed:!1,videoPaused:!1,videoResumed:!1,videoSeeking:!1,videoCompleted:!1,timePercentComplete:0}});\"function\"===typeof ga&&(vimeoGAJS.gaTracker=\"ua\");\"undefined\"!==typeof _gaq&&\"function\"===typeof _gaq.push&&(vimeoGAJS.gaTracker=\"ga\");\"undefined\"!==typeof dataLayer&&\n\"function\"===typeof dataLayer.push&&(vimeoGAJS.gaTracker=\"gtm\");window.addEventListener?window.addEventListener(\"message\",vimeoGAJS.onMessageReceived,!1):window.attachEvent(\"onmessage\",vimeoGAJS.onMessageReceived,!1)},onMessageReceived:function(b){if(\"http://player.vimeo.com\"===b.origin.replace(\"https:\",\"http:\")&&\"undefined\"!==typeof \"playProgress\":vimeoGAJS.onPlayProgress(b.data,\na);break;case \"seek\":a.data(\"seek\")&&!vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[c].videoSeeking&&(vimeoGAJS.sendEvent(a,\"Skipped video forward or backward\"),vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[c].videoSeeking=!0);break;case \"play\":vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[c].videoPlayed?!vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[c].videoResumed&&vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[c].videoPaused&&(vimeoGAJS.sendEvent(a,\"Resumed video\"),vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[c].videoResumed=!0):(vimeoGAJS.sendEvent(a,\"Started video\"),vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[c].videoPlayed=!0);break;case \"pause\":vimeoGAJS.onPause(a);\nbreak;case \"finish\":vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[c].videoCompleted||(vimeoGAJS.sendEvent(a,\"Completed video\"),vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[c].videoCompleted=!0)}}},getUrl:function(b){var a=document.URL.split(\":\")[0];return null===b.match(/^http/)?a+\":\"+b:b},post:function(b,a,c){b={method:b};a&&(b.value=a);a=$(c).attr(\"src\").split(\"?\")[0];c.contentWindow.postMessage(JSON.stringify(b),vimeoGAJS.getUrl(a))},onReady:function(){$.each(vimeoGAJS.iframes,function(b,a){vimeoGAJS.post(\"addEventListener\",\"play\",a);vimeoGAJS.post(\"addEventListener\",\n\"seek\",a);vimeoGAJS.post(\"addEventListener\",\"pause\",a);vimeoGAJS.post(\"addEventListener\",\"finish\",a);vimeoGAJS.post(\"addEventListener\",\"playProgress\",a)})},onPause:function(b){var a=b.attr(\"id\");99>vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[a].timePercentComplete&&!vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[a].videoPaused&&(vimeoGAJS.sendEvent(b,\"Paused video\"),vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[a].videoPaused=!0)},onPlayProgress:function(b,a){var c,d=a.attr(\"id\");vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[d].timePercentComplete=Math.round(100*b.percent);a.data(\"progress\")&&\n(24<vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[d].timePercentComplete&&!vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[d].progress25&&(c=\"Played video: 25%\",vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[d].progress25=!0),49<vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[d].timePercentComplete&&!vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[d].progress50&&(c=\"Played video: 50%\",vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[d].progress50=!0),74<vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[d].timePercentComplete&&!vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[d].progress75&&(c=\"Played video: 75%\",vimeoGAJS.eventMarker[d].progress75=!0),c&&vimeoGAJS.sendEvent(a,c))},sendEvent:function(b,\na){var c=b.attr(\"src\").split(\"?\")[0],d=b.data(\"bounce\");switch(vimeoGAJS.gaTracker){case \"gtm\":dataLayer.push({event:\"Vimeo\",eventCategory:\"Vimeo\",eventAction:a,eventLabel:vimeoGAJS.getUrl(c),eventValue:void 0,eventNonInteraction:d?!1:!0});break;case \"ua\":ga(\"send\",\"event\",\"Vimeo\",a,vimeoGAJS.getUrl(c),void 0,{nonInteraction:d?0:1});break;case \"ga\":_gaq.push([\"_trackEvent\",\"Vimeo\",a,vimeoGAJS.getUrl(c),void 0,d?!1:!0])}}};$(function(){vimeoGAJS.init()});</script><script type=\"text/javascript\" id=\"\">$(window).load(function(){var
